General.Name: Lagnam Spintex Limited
General.Description: Lagnam Spintex Limited manufactures and sells cotton yarns in India. The company's products are used in various applications, such as denims, terry towels, home textiles, bottom wears, shirting, sheetings, sweaters, socks, weaving and knitting, industrial fabrics, etc. It exports its products to Portugal, Italy, Germany, Turkey, Egypt, Belgium, South Africa, Slovania, Columbia, China, Pakistan, Bangladesh, South Korea, Peru, Guatemala, and other countries. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is based in Bhilwara, India.
General.Address: A 51- 53, RIICO Growth Centre, Bhilwara, India, 311001
